abstract.t: The ISAKMP, IKE and IPSec DOI RFCs [RFC2408, RFC2409, RFC2407]specify how an IPSec tunnel is negotiated with an encrypting securitygateway (peer), however, they do not specify how the initiator knowswho the encrypting peer is. This document specifies a method wherethe initiator can find the appropriate peer, and also negotiate amutually acceptable set of proxies.
